title: Add GitHub-optional mode with install-mcp-no-github target
description:
## Problem
Currently Bob assumes GitHub is available and required. This causes issues when:
- Users don't have GitHub CLI installed
- Users don't want GitHub integration
- MONITOR phase tries to create PRs when GitHub isn't needed

## Goals
Make GitHub completely optional with a flag or build target that:
1. Disables task/issue GitHub integration
2. Short-circuits MONITOR phase (skips push/PR creation)
3. Allows Bob to work purely locally

## Implementation Tasks

### 1. Add Makefile Target
Create `install-mcp-no-github` target that:
- Builds Bob with a GitHub-disabled flag/tag
- Installs to `~/.bob/bob`
- Registers with Claude MCP without GitHub features

### 2. MONITOR Phase Short-Circuit
Modify MONITOR phase guidance to:
- Check if GitHub is enabled
- If disabled, skip push/PR steps
- Move directly to COMPLETE phase
- Provide message: "GitHub disabled - workflow complete locally"

### 3. Task/Issue System Changes
When GitHub disabled:
- Task system works purely with local `.bob/issues/` files
- No GitHub sync operations
- No PR/issue linking

### 4. Configuration
Add configuration option (environment variable or config file):
- `BOB_GITHUB_ENABLED=false` OR
- `.bob/config.json`: `{"github": {"enabled": false}}`

## Files to Modify
- `Makefile` - Add install-mcp-no-github target
- `cmd/bob/prompts/*/monitor.md` - Add GitHub check
- `cmd/bob/state_manager.go` - Check GitHub flag in MONITOR routing
- `cmd/bob/task_manager.go` - Disable GitHub sync when flag is off
- `README.md` - Document GitHub-optional mode

## Success Criteria
- `make install-mcp-no-github` successfully installs Bob
- MONITOR phase skips GitHub operations when disabled
- All local workflows work without GitHub CLI
- Task system works purely locally
- Clear error messages if user tries GitHub operations when disabled

## Edge Cases
- User has GitHub CLI but wants local-only mode
- User switches between GitHub-enabled and GitHub-disabled modes
- Existing workflows in progress when mode changes

## Related
This addresses the underlying issue where Bob workflows assume GitHub is always available and required.
